quest.name: A Defector's Tidings
journal: The news from Ala Mhigo has left Alisaie in a state of nervous excitement.
objectives: Speak with the Resistance guard in the Ala Mhigan Quarter.

dialogue.name: KRILE
dialogue.text: I'm sorry I couldn't do more. I've never seen a soul's thread end so abruptly before...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I almost can't bear to hear what Maxima has to tell us...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: But it can't be bad news, can it? Lyse would have said. Unless─ Agh, there's no point speculating. Lyse said she'd notified the guards of our coming, so we should head straight to the palace gate in the Ala Mhigan Quarter.

dialogue.name: KRILE
dialogue.text: I'll be praying for good news. Learn what you can about Alphinaud's plight, and leave the search for our friends' lost souls to me.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Alphinaud will be all right. He has to be.

dialogue.name: RESISTANCEGATEGUARD
dialogue.text: Greetings, Scions─the commander told me to expect you. Shall I show you in?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: Enter the Royal Palace?

dialogue.name: RESISTANCEGATEGUARD
dialogue.text:
So the Garleans make ready to move against us, do they? Well, I would sooner die than wear shackles again...
Commander Hext mentioned you carry a message for Lord Hien. May your road to the Far East be free of imperial curs.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: So, Alphinaud is safe─for the present, at least. Now all we need to worry about is a full-scale imperial invasion...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I'm actually glad Lyse tasked us with visiting Lord Hien─better to be dashing from place to place than sitting around stewing over things we can't change. To the enclave!

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Forename. You have arrived in time to witness the beginnings of our new alliance. Our proposal struck a chord with many of our neighbors, I am pleased to say.

dialogue.name: HAKUROU
dialogue.text: Alone, Doma could accomplish little against the Empire, but in concert with the allies who have gathered here today, we might do much.

dialogue.name: TANSUI
dialogue.text: The imperials have enjoyed the freedom of the Ruby Sea for long enough. 'Tis time they paid their dues.

dialogue.name: AOKORAHERALD
dialogue.text: We of the Blue Kojin will not submit to the Empire's tyranny. If only our Red brethren would awaken to their folly...

dialogue.name: CIRINA
dialogue.text: After their humbling at your hands, Magnai and his Oronir have spent every waking moment upon the training fields. Defeat does not sit well with the Sun and his children.

dialogue.name: NAGUSAHERALD
dialogue.text: I am come to represent the lands of Nagxia. Long have we struggled in defiance of the Empire, waiting for just such an opportunity as this alliance presents.

dialogue.name: DALMASCAHERALD
dialogue.text: The fall of Rabanastre was not the end of our nation. We who survived retreated underground, and have been gathering strength to mount a counteroffensive. Dalmasca will rise again.

dialogue.name: KIENKANGATEKEEPER03028
dialogue.text: I see you have tidings for Lord Hien. May I show you in?

dialogue.name: EVENTAREA
dialogue.text: Enter the Kienkan?

dialogue.name: TANSUI
dialogue.text: The young lord of Doma has requested my presence. I do hope my garb is fancy enough for his hall.

dialogue.name: CIRINA
dialogue.text: A war council for the alliance is about to begin, and I have been chosen as the voice of the Steppe. I shall do my utmost to represent the will of all the tribes.

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: Greetings, my friends. I was just discussing future endeavors with the members of our newly formed alliance.

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: The Kojin and the Confederacy you already know, and it was your own strength of arms that won us the cooperation of the Steppe tribes.

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: We have also been joined by our neighbors from Nagxia, and the indomitable citizens of Dalmasca...though the scattered nature of the latter's resistance will somewhat delay their official induction.

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: These proud peoples have united under a single purpose: to stand against the tyranny of the Garlean Empire.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I am glad to see your alliance is coming together so swiftly. As things stand, I fear we shall soon have need of your strength...

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: I thank you for bringing me news of Alphinaud. His fate is never far from my thoughts─and not only because he is our emissary. As for this sudden deployment of imperial forces, I agree that Ala Mhigo would be wise to shore up its borders with all haste.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Every report we receive from our shinobi indicates a massing of troops in the western provinces. It seems all but certain that the Empire is poised to bring its fist down upon Eorzea.

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: And I would help deflect that blow. But I cannot risk sending reinforcements just yet. We will remain vulnerable to airborne assault until our wall in the Burn is in place.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: The all-important Allagan energy barrier.

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: The...energy barrier, yes. I thought to call it something more auspicious. A name drawn from the Four Lords of legend, perhaps─“Seiryu's Aegis” or some such. Well, just a thought.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: The Ironworks engineers report that they have finished calibrating the generators, and are ready to proceed to the testing stage.

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: Have you time to attend the first test? You've seen the field which protected Azys Lla firsthand, and I would be interested to hear how you think ours compares.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I will come too, if you don't mind. Though I am no Y'shtola, I may be able to offer some insight.

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: Of course. Time being of the essence, it would be best if we made directly for the Burn. Yugiri, I leave you and Hakuro to bring the war council to a close.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text:
Understood.
Your mounts are saddled and ready, my lord. Ware the storms.
